meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Larry Krajewski Kathy DeLozier George McAleese Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6596.

td.p: Larry Krajewski, a postal worker from Safety Harbor, Florida
Kathy DeLozier, an elementary school principal from Louisville, Kentucky
George McAleese, a political researcher from Washington, D.C. (whose 2-day cash winnings total $56,402)

tr.td: THE SEXIEST POTPOURRI EVER
STATE FACTS
"ON"WORDS & "UP"WORDS
MOVIE MAKEOVERS
REVENGE
A DISH BEST SERVED COLD

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Let\'s turn the lights low & give thanks to this man who also gave the world the first industrial research lab')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Let's turn the lights low & give thanks to this man who also gave the world the first industrial research lab

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '(Kathy: ...Ummm... oh gosh... I\'ve lost it.)
[NOTE: Nearly all clues on the show are written in all capital letters, a convention the J! Archive does not follow, but it would seem internally contradictory not to put this clue in all caps.]

uppercase

Kathy
Triple Stumper
')
